title: Strong Export Capacity
description: In 2023, Vietnam's exports of goods and services reached 5,429,413,647,635,100 LCU, showcasing its robust capacity to trade globally.

title: Efficient Tax System
description: Vietnam's taxation system scored 89.85 in operational efficiency in 2024, indicating a streamlined and effective tax administration.

title: Positive External Balance
description: In 2023, Vietnam maintained a positive external balance on goods and services, valued at 820,797,300,000,000 LCU, reflecting a surplus in trade.

title: High Broad Money Supply
description: The broad money supply in Vietnam reached 13,109,658,074,994,700 LCU in 2022, indicating a strong monetary base.

title: Gender Equality Progress
description: Vietnam scored 4.5 on the CPIA gender equality rating in 2015, showing significant progress towards gender parity.

title: High Net Domestic Credit
description: In 2022, Vietnam's net domestic credit was valued at 12,108,290,082,835,600 LCU, reflecting a strong credit system.

title: High Terms of Trade Adjustment
description: Vietnam's terms of trade adjustment stood at 479,453,875,270,286 LCU in 2023, indicating favorable trade conditions.

title: Strong Import Capacity
description: In 2023, Vietnam's imports of goods and services were valued at 5,364,601,047,635,100 LCU, demonstrating a robust import capacity.

title: Negative GDP Discrepancy
description: In 2023, Vietnam faced a GDP expenditure discrepancy of -350,432,405,884,700 LCU, indicating potential issues in economic reporting.

title: Moderate Net Secondary Income
description: Vietnam's net secondary income from abroad was 310,543,451,725,185 LCU in 2023, reflecting moderate remittance inflows.
